title: Issues retrieving account Because of missing CAPTCHA
body: For some reason when im trying to recover my account, I cant find the captcha. Is this a bug right now? thanks. Also Im low level so I cant respond to posts.

replies.body:
Hey I've been seeing a few reports on this so I'll see if something is up.  Check your extensions and clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) just in case.  If the issue persists, you can also contact us via support@riotgames.com.

What's the exact error message that you're getting when trying to submit?  Can you grab a screenshot?
